PiinPoint (YC W14) - Waterloo, ON, Canada, http://www.piinpoint.com

PiinPoint is a YCombinator and seed funded company building a geospatial mapping software focused on helping retailers find their next store location, and enabling them to monitor the performance of their current ones.

We are looking for a front end software engineer to work full time with our core team in Kitchener, Ontario. Our team is comprised of University of Waterloo students and graduates who went through YCombinator this most recent winter.

Our solution is a web application that is heavily map based, so there are plenty of fun challenges that go along with this, particularly optimization and spatial data visualization. You will work heavily with the Leaflet javascript library for interactive maps.

View the full posting at https://www.piinpoint.com/careers and email me at adam@piinpoint.com if you're interested.
